title: War In Ukraine (Ep 1712)
description:
War breaks out in Ukraine. In this episode I address the disturbing details of the attack. 

News Picks:


This account of a Trump - Putin meeting is worth reading about.


Did we evacuate terrorists to the US from Afghanistan?

New study finds strong evidence that COVID leaked from a lab. 

Who is watching what we do online? The Spygate case has some clues.


Dictator Trudeau halts his “Emergency Powers.” For now. 


Parler subpoenas twitter for its role in deplatforming.

Biden shuts down a Trump era program designed to stop CCP spying.

War breaks out in Ukraine. In this episode I address the disturbing details of the attack.

  • New study finds strong evidence that COVID leaked from a lab. 
  • Who is watching what we do online? The Spygate case has some clues.
  • Dictator Trudeau halts his “Emergency Powers.” For now. 
  • Parler subpoenas twitter for its role in deplatforming.
